General.Name: Kinepolis Group NV
General.Description: Kinepolis Group NV operates cinema complexes in Belgium, the Netherlands, France, Spain, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Poland, Canada, and the United States. The company sells cinema tickets, as well as events and vouchers to companies and publicity campaigns in the cinema; and beverages and snacks in the cinemas, as well as offers the self-service shop and other in-theatre sales concepts. It is also involved in international and domestic movie distribution, event organization, screen advertising, and property ownership activities; and the provision of technological services to third parties. The company has a portfolio of 110 cinema complexes, including 51 own complexes comprising 1,124 screens and approximately 200,000 seats. Kinepolis Group NV was incorporated in 1976 and is based in Brussels, Belgium.

5.Name: Mr. Eric Vanden Berghe
5.Title: Managing Director of Kinepolis Real Estate
